input: goal: linens [SEP] solution 1serve as bedding on comfortable beds for humans [SEP] solution 2serve as bedding on tent floors in the great ourdoors for humans
goal: Create a privacy screen in shared room. [SEP] solution 1Hang up bed sheet in middle of room. [SEP] solution 2Hang up tissue paper in middle of room.
goal: fingernail [SEP] solution 1can be painted like a bin  [SEP] solution 2can climb out of a bin

goal: To remove the pressurized can of homemade dog food from the pressure canner [SEP] solution 1Allow the entire pressure canner to remain hot, remove the jars from the container and allow to boil for 24 hrs [SEP] solution 2Allow the entire pressure canner to cool, remove the jars from the container and allow to rest for 24 hrs

goal: To attach a card to the lid of the brownie batter in a jar [SEP] solution 1Glue the side of  the card to the jar so that it doesn't fall off and is easily seen [SEP] solution 2Cut a small hole in the card, looping thread through it to hold the the card to the jar
goal: t-shirt [SEP] solution 1protect chest burns [SEP] solution 2protect skin burns
goal: how do you find a lost phone in your house? [SEP] solution 1text it. [SEP] solution 2call it.

goal: To make a simple jig [SEP] solution 1Cut a 3/4 inch strip, screw to a flat piece of 1/6 wood, clamp it to a drill press [SEP] solution 2Cut a 3/4 inch strip, screw to a jagged piece of 1/6 wood, clamp it to a drill press

goal: How do I make peanut butter and jelly cookie [SEP] solution 1Make the dough with peanut butter, sugar, and an egg, place dough on wax paper push down in the middle with your toe and add some jelly. [SEP] solution 2Make the dough with peanut butter, sugar, and an egg, place dough on parchment paper push down in the middle with your thumb and add some jelly.

goal: What should I do if I have unused business attire that I want to donate? [SEP] solution 1Donate the items to the red cross or another similar charity, they use the items for people who are trying to get a job and are poor. [SEP] solution 2Donate the items to Dress for Success or another similar charity, they use the items for people who are trying to get a job and are poor.

goal: What ingredients do you need to make a coconut pie? [SEP] solution 1Coconut, flour, sugar, pepper and oil [SEP] solution 2Coconut, flour, sugar and oil
goal: how do you center a picture? [SEP] solution 1put it on the edge. [SEP] solution 2put it in the middle.

goal: How to dull a bedside light for reading at night? [SEP] solution 1Place a dark colored lampshade over the light so it produces a darkened color [SEP] solution 2Place a light colored lampshade over the light so it produces a darkened color
goal: To sweeten chili, you can [SEP] solution 1Add some brown sugar [SEP] solution 2Add some tabasco sauce
